assessment_item.body: {"data":{"plugin":{"id":"org.ekstep.questionunit.reorder","version":"1.0","templateId":"reorderingtemplate"},"data":{"question":{"text":"Arrange the given words in proper order to form a sentence."},"sentence":{"text":"A binary search algorithm is a method to determine the position of a target value within a sorted array (an ordered list","tabs":[{"text":"A","id":0,"$$hashKey":"object:3292"},{"text":"binary","id":1,"$$hashKey":"object:3293"},{"text":"search","id":2,"$$hashKey":"object:3294"},{"text":"algorithm","id":3,"$$hashKey":"object:3295"},{"text":"is","id":4,"$$hashKey":"object:3296"},{"text":"a","id":5,"$$hashKey":"object:3297"},{"text":"method","id":6,"$$hashKey":"object:3298"},{"text":"to","id":7,"$$hashKey":"object:3299"},{"text":"determine","id":8,"$$hashKey":"object:3300"},{"text":"the","id":9,"$$hashKey":"object:3301"},{"text":"position","id":10,"$$hashKey":"object:3302"},{"text":"of","id":11,"$$hashKey":"object:3303"},{"text":"a","id":12,"$$hashKey":"object:3304"},{"text":"target","id":13,"$$hashKey":"object:3305"},{"text":"value","id":14,"$$hashKey":"object:3306"},{"text":"within","id":15,"$$hashKey":"object:3307"},{"text":"a","id":16,"$$hashKey":"object:3308"},{"text":"sorted","id":17,"$$hashKey":"object:3309"},{"text":"array","id":18,"$$hashKey":"object:3310"},{"text":"(an","id":20,"$$hashKey":"object:3311"},{"text":"ordered","id":21,"$$hashKey":"object:3312"},{"text":"list","id":22,"$$hashKey":"object:3313"}]}},"config":{"metadata":{"max_score":1,"isShuffleOption":false,"isPartialScore":true,"templateType":"Horizontal","name":"Arrange","title":"Arrange","board":"State (Karnataka)","medium":"Kannada","gradeLevel":["Class 5","Class 5"],"subject":"Urdu","qlevel":"EASY","category":"mcq"},"max_time":0,"max_score":1,"partial_scoring":true,"layout":"Horizontal","isShuffleOption":false,"questionCount":1}}}
